mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pending_markers (latitude, longitude, title, image, created_at, approved) VALUES (#{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{title}, #{image}, NOW(), FALSE);
INSERT INTO markers (latitude, longitude, title, images, created_at, approved) VALUES (#{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{title}, #{image}, NOW(), TRUE);
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pending_markers WHERE approved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM markers WHERE approved = TRUE;
